description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The International Riding and Show Jumping Contest in Berlin and agricultural show; Harold Wilson in Berlin; a new museum dedicated to German expressionist artists; Dortmund in the Rhine-Ruhr area; Wuppertal's monorail suspension railway and famous Clock Museum; the European figure skating and ice dancing championships; skiing and the first synthetic ice toboggan track.
